text: right for cutting a little for bread the
best thing you need is a bread knife and
all it is is it is a long straight knife
with serrated edge on the bottom quite a
stiff blade and a chopping board but to
cut the bread the secret is not to push
too hard let that let the serrated edge
of the knife do the work move it back
and forward and it will cut through the
bread and don't need to chop it you
don't need to hack it keep the bread
still move the knife back and forward
make sure you're cutting vertically you
don't want to end up cutting the loaf
like that or like that and make sure
that the the the knife is straight
parallel to the last cut that you made
otherwise you'll get what a slice of
bread with a thin end and a thick end
which is not good so don't push too hard
keep your knife vertical and that's how
to slice a loaf
